name: Cosmic Conflict
description:
Our game is an endless tower defense that requires the user to defend their space station from the  progressively more difficult waves of oncoming enemy ships.  While defending your space station you have the option to upgrade it, giving you more attack speed, cannon rotation speed, ally ships, and a shield refresh. Your goal is to survive as long as you can while also taking down as many enemy ships possible before you become overrun. 

Created by: Leah Blasczyk (@Lebrra), Sydney Myers (@Sydney Myers), and Wesley McWhorter (@WesMcW)

Music: "Airship Serenity" by Kevin Macleod
